content.rendered:
After being discharged from the Marines, James Harper joins a paramilitary organization to continue supporting his family as a mercenary.

Directed By Tarik Saleh

Written By J.P. Davis

Stars: Chris Pine. Gillian Jacobs. Sander Thomas
